tutorial: 4. Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: This is the Stage Quoted Asset bit of the Strategy Open Stage. If the actual size changes, what happens with the Size Placed?

paragraphs.text: Check the warning in the Size Placed node!
In the context of either the open stage or the close stage, size placed is a variable that accumulates the total size placed during the stage, so it must be adjusted to!
